# Introduction 

This document contains solutions for the exam, making use of the `dplyr`, `tidyr` and `stringr` libraries.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(here)
```

```{r}
exam_data <- read.csv(here("data", ".csv"))
```
